articles.description: House prices and shares keep on rising even as lockdowns are extended and COVID threatens to throw Australia into a double-dip recession, writes David Taylor.
articles.content:
There's a bizarre narrative playing out in the Australian economy right now.
As we stare down the potential of a so-called "double-dip recession", asset markets are booming. 
Treasury and most mark… [+8132 chars]
